content.rendered: Roles, Responsibilities, and Expectations: The Executive Assistant provides advanced administrative support to members of the Executive Team and the Administration Department; exercises considerable discretion in the performance of duties and responsibilities   Work Experience Required: Five (5) years of experience in an Executive Administrative support role Must have strong computer skills and proficiency using Microsoft Office products (Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint). Excellent verbal and written communication skills.  Strong technical writing and editing capabilities.   Work Experience Preferred: Experience with building and managing Microsoft Access databases Fluent in Spanish   Education/Certification Minimum: Associates degree in English, Business, Communications or a related area.   Education/Certification Preferred: Bachelor’s degree English, Business, Communications or a related area.   Qualifications: This level of knowledge is typically acquired through completion of a Bachelor’s Degree in a Business related field and at least 5 years executive level administrative experience Advanced knowledge of file maintenance, English grammar, appropriate standards regarding letters, memorandum, composition, and proper telephone etiquette Advanced PC and software application skills including Microsoft Office Outlook, Excel, Word, and Access; Advanced skills in Adobe products Advanced interpersonal, verbal, and written communication skills Advanced organization skills; ability to handle multiple complex priorities simultaneously in a competent and professional manner Ability to work with data/information requiring a high degree of confidentiality Ability to work on time-sensitive issues with poise Ability to interact with members of the Executive Team and the Administration Department with the utmost professionalism Ability to keep personal matters of the Executive Team confidential Ability to handle calendar and tasks for the Executive Team and the Administration Department Salary and benefits commensurate with experience. We are an equal opportunity employer All offers of employment are conditioned upon successfully passing a drug test.
